channel.title: Experiments on Andrew Mason, Creative Technologist
channel.description: Recent content in Experiments on Andrew Mason, Creative Technologist

item.description: Gameboy pocket webgl - coder on fire { "@context" : "http://schema.org", "@type" : "Person", "name" : "Andrew Mason", "jobTitle": "Creative developer", "email": "andrew@coderonfire.com", "url" : "https://www.coderonfire.com", "sameAs" : [ "https://twitter.com/amason", "https://github.com/andymason" ] } how was this made? Fullscreen

GLITCHOR. Generate image glitches. Drop image here Working... Use webcam or Glitch amount JPEG start position (top - bottom) Randomise glitch Clear settings JPEG Artifacts Scanlines Colour seperation Bend Stutter Tint Invert Threshold Border Strands TV Overlay Desaturate White noise Sample image

ROOM 47 body { background-color: #000; margin: 0; padding: 0; } audio { position: absolute; top: -1000px; left: -1000px; } a:link, a:visited, a:hover, a:active { border: none; } #bedroom { width: 90%; margin: 20px auto 0 auto; position: relative; overflow: hidden; display: grid; grid-gap: 12px; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); grid-auto-rows: minmax(0, auto); max-width: 1200px; } @media (min-width: 600px) { #bedroom { margin-top: 30px; } } @media (min-width: 600px) { #bedroom { grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr); } } @media (min-width: 900px) { #bedroom { grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr); } } #time { color: #222; font-family: monospace; font-size: 11px; text-align: right; width: 90%; margin: 0 auto; padding: 10px; clear: both; max-width: 1200px; } .

You will need to allow pop-ups in your browser to see the rendered image.
